articles.description: Julian Alvarez scores his 10th league goal of the season to help Atletico Madrid beat Athletic Bilbao and move top of La Liga.
articles.title: Atletico Madrid 1-0 Athletic Bilbao: Julian Alvarez hits winner to take side top

articles.description: Bournemouth progressed to the quarter-finals of the FA Cup for only the third time in their history with a penalty shootout victory over Wolves at Vitality Stadium.
articles.title: AFC Bournemouth 1-1 Wolverhampton Wanderers (5-4 on penalties): Cherries reach FA Cup last eight

articles.description: A familiar white-ball defeat for England in Karachi must mark the start of their rebuild, writes Matthew Henry.
articles.title: Champions Trophy 2025: England's defeat in Karachi should mark start of rebuild

articles.description: Follow live text & radio commentary as Wigan Warriors face Warrington Wolves in the Super League in Las Vegas.
articles.title: Super League LIVE: Wigan Warriors v Warrington Wolves - follow radio commentary & live text from Las Vegas

articles.description: Live text commentary of Lewis Crocker versus Paddy Donovan in a IBF title eliminator at the SSE Arena, Belfast
articles.title: IBF title eliminator: Lewis Crocker v Paddy Donovan - text updates

articles.description: Celtic move to within three wins away of retaining the Scottish Premiership crown after seeing off St Mirren in a seven-goal classic in Paisley to extend their lead at the top of the table to 16 points.
articles.title: Celtic beat St Mirren 5-2 to extend Scottish Premiership lead

articles.description: A goalkeeper holding the ball for more than eight seconds will be punished with a corner for the opposition from this summer.
articles.title: Eight-second law: New law to tackle goalkeeper time-wasting introduced

articles.description: Clubs pay tribute to Spanish midfielder Nico Hidalgo, who has died aged 32 after being diagnosed with lung cancer.
articles.title: Nico Hidalgo: Clubs pay tribute after Spanish midfielder dies of lung cancer aged 32

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Manchester City vs Plymouth Argyle in the FA Cup
articles.title: Manchester City vs Plymouth Argyle: FA Cup stats & head-to-head

articles.description: Luke Littler and Luke Humphries both book their place in the quarter-finals of the UK Open with victories in the fifth and sixth rounds on Saturday.
articles.title: UK Open: Luke Littler and Luke Humphries through to the quarter-finals
